verses.text: All for Jesus, all for Jesus, All my being's ransomed powers; All my thoughts and words and doings, All my days and all my hours.
Let my hands perform his bidding, Let my feet run in his ways; Let my eyes see Jesus only, Let my lips speak forth his praise.
Worldlings prize their gems of beauty, Cling to gilded toys of dust; Boast of wealth and seek for honor, Jesus is my life, my trust.
Since my eyes were fixed on Jesus, I've lost sight of all beside; So enchained my spirit's vision, Looking at the Crucified.
